UPDATE btf_org_info
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_code = #{org_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_name = #{org_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_ename = #{org_ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_type = #{org_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_degree = #{org_degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_status = #{org_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_work_status = #{org_work_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logout_time = #{logout_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
login_time = #{login_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid_flag = #{valid_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
par_org_code = #{par_org_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_seq = #{org_seq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_addr = #{org_addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_zipcode = #{org_zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_email = #{org_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_linkman = #{org_linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_linktel = #{org_linktel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINKMAN = #{LINKMAN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_MANAGER = #{ORG_MANAGER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auth_user_list = #{auth_user_list,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_DATE = #{START_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_DATE = #{END_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AREA = #{AREA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_TIME = #{OPEN_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_TIME = #{CLOSE_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARK = #{MARK,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PEN_DATE = #{PEN_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORG_ACCT_DATE = #{ORG_ACCT_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OP_FLAG = #{OP_FLAG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TD_FLAG = #{TD_FLAG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOR_TYPE = #{FOR_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASH_USER_CNT = #{CASH_USER_CNT,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MCCTL_USER_CNT = #{MCCTL_USER_CNT,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SIGN_OUT_FLAG = #{SIGN_OUT_FLAG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE 1=1 and id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from btf_org_info where 1=1 and id = #{id}
